projects.name: Code Cards
projects.desc: Code Cards is a web-app built to help developers share their software projects in real life. Developers are asked all the time, 'So what are you working on?'. Code Cards is here to help! Built using the T3 stack (TypeScript, TailwindCSS, tRPC, React-Hooks, Prisma ORM, PostgreSQL).

projects.name: RBG E-store
projects.desc: Rock Bottom Guild Store is a proof of concept/mock up of an online store for the Rock Bottom Guild brand. It was created using Next.Js, React-Hooks, Postgresql with Prisma, and is hosted through Vercel. Users can view, select, and mock purchase products using PayPal sandbox account credentials, and contact the site's maintainers using the contact form.

projects.name: Dungeon Builder
projects.desc: Dungeon Builder is a website that helps people deepen their table top fantasy game experience. Users can create, edit, and delete documents like weapons and armor (and many more) by using the site's easy to fill out forms. Uses email verification, JWTs, session cookies, validation, and sanitization.

projects.name: Rock Bottom Guild
projects.desc: Rock Bottom Guild is a local fabricator that specializes in creating custom hitch signs while offering other services. Users can view past projects and fill out the contact form to get more information. This site is a NextJs app hosted with Vercel.
